snippet.title: Terraformers Game - Early Trailer (Sept. 2019)
snippet.description:
Be among the first to get updates about the project and when we will enter a closed beta! Signup for our newsletter at https://www.terraformers-game.com

Twitter: @terraf_game 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Terraformers-Game

We made this trailer mainly to apply for the "Interactive Media Projects" grant from Pro Helvetia (Switzerland). Let us know what you think!

Let's Terraform this Planet!
